price: Tunay na Kami ay nagpatnubay sa kanya sa landas, na maaaring maging isang tagapagpasalamat at maaaring maging isang mapagtangging magpasalamat.
arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā hadaynāhu al-sabīla immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran
